sentences.en: A tablet commemorates his patriotic activities.
sentences.cn: 碑文铭记他的爱国行动.

sentences.en: An input device that provides coordinates of a position. Example: A mouse , a tablet.
sentences.cn: 提供位置座标的一种输入设备. 例如 鼠标器 、 图形输入板.

sentences.en: Fill a glass with water and dissolve this tablet in it.
sentences.cn: 倒杯水把药片放进去溶解了.

sentences.en: I bought a tablet of soap.
One tablet will purify a litre of water.
She took a couple of headache tablets .
Take a tablet and your headache will go.
sentences.cn: 吃一片药你的头就不疼了.

sentences.en: Take one tablet after each meal -- three tablets a day.
sentences.cn: 每次饭后服一片, 一天三次.

sentences.en: Take one tablet every four hours.
That was the message left on the stone tablet that we have.
sentences.cn: 那是留在我们那块石碑上的信息.

sentences.en: The inscriptions on the stone tablet have become blurred with the passage of time.
sentences.cn: 年代久了,石碑上的字迹已经模糊了.

sentences.en: The names of those who died are recorded for posterity on a tablet at the back of the church.
sentences.cn: 死者姓名都刻在教堂后面的一块石匾上以便后人铭记.

sentences.en: The recommended dosage is one tablet every four hours.
sentences.cn: 规定剂量为每四小时服一片.

sentences.en: There is a tablet in memory of those who died.
sentences.cn: 那儿有一块碑纪念死去的人.

sentences.en: You can also take red ginseng in convenient tablet or capsule form.
sentences.cn: 你也可以选择便于服用的红参片或红参胶囊。
